hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT A.USER_ID||NVL(C.ROLE_ID, '') compKey, A.USER_ID userId, A.USER_NAME userName, A.PASSWORD password, A.ENABLED enabled, A.CREATE_DATE createDate, A.MODIFY_DATE modifyDate, B.GROUP_ID groupId, C.ROLE_ID roleId FROM USERS A LEFT JOIN GROUPS_USERS B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN AUTHORITIES C ON A.USER_ID = C.SUBJECT_ID AND C.TYPE = 'U'
